job.command:
# -------------------------- # Reconstruction of the simulated jobs # -------------------------- set jobTitle="STAR Reconstruction of the simulated events" time echo ${jobTitle} # -------------------------- # Some user constants # -------------------------- set nSimulatedEvents=5 set HIJINGOUTPUT=evgen.1.nt set finalDirectory=/star/rcf/prodlog/P04id/log/trs # -------------------------- # check which site we are working on set BNL=0 set remoteNode=stargrid02.rcf.bnl.gov # --- URL: http://www-pdsf.nersc.gov/~username/ ---- set localWebPage=~/public_html if ( `hostname -d` == "rcf.bnl.gov" ) then; set BNL=1 set remoteNode=pdsfgrid2.nersc.gov # --- URL: http://www.rhic.bnl.gov/~username/ ---- set localWebPage=~/WWW endif # ---- at BNL (local node) ----- # set finalNode=gsiftp://${remoteNode} set finalPackageDirectory=${finalNode}/${finalDirectory} # local file directory tree definition set packageDirectory=${localWebPage}/gridwork/reco set packageDirectoryBin=${packageDirectory}/bin set registerDirectory=${packageDirectory}/register/$REQUESTID set localLogFile=${registerDirectory}/$PROCESSID.html # # ----- end of the node parameteres ----- # ---- prepare the local directory tree # mkdir -p ${registerDirectory} mkdir -p ${packageDirectoryBin} # ----- The list of the application parameters ----- # set JOBSEED = $PROCESSID$REQUESTID # # ----- End of the application parameters ----- module load globus # --- # Start the local Web page # --- echo "${jobTitle} $PROCESSID.$REQUESTID has been started 
"  >${localLogFile}
    cd ${packageDirectoryBin}

#    -------------------------------
#    Set the proper version of STAR software release
#    -------------------------------

    source /star/u/starreco/.cshrc
    source /afs/rhic.bnl.gov/rhstar/group/.stardev
    stardev
    setenv StarEndMakerShell

    echo "${STAR_LIB} ${STAR_PATH}"
    unsetenv  STAR_LIB
    STAR_LIB=/afs/rhic.bnl.gov/star/packages/DEV/.i386_linux24/lib

#    -------------------------------
#    Go to the working are 
#    -------------------------------

    cd $SCRATCH

#    -------------------------------
#    Bring the remote file in 
#    -------------------------------

     set JOBFILEBASENAME=`basename ${INPUTFILE0}`
     set ZEBRAINPUT=${JOBFILEBASENAME}`
     globus-url-copy -p 25  ${remoteNode}${INPUTFILE0}  file:$SCRATCH/${ZEBRAINPUT}


    #set nFile=0
    #while ( $nFile < $INPUTFILECOUNT )
    #  eval set filename = '$INPUTFILE'$nFile 

        # put your script here, with filename as input file
    #   echo $filename 
    #   set nFile++
    # end


#    -------------------------------
#   start "root4star" from the bin directory
#    -------------------------------
    root4star -b -q \'bfc.C\(${nSimulatedEvents},\"trs,srs,fss,y2004,tpc,l0,svt,Cdst,Kalman,tags,Tree,bbcsim,tofsim,evout,est,-xi,-v0,xi2,XiSvt,svtdEdx,emcY2,eefs,GeantOut,big,-dstout,CMuDst,fzin\",\"${ZEBRAINPUT}\"\)\' 
    echo root4star -b -q \'bfc.C\(100,\"trs,srs,fss,y2004,tpc,l0,svt,Cdst,Kalman,tags,Tree,bbcsim,tofsim,evout,est,-xi,-v0,xi2,XiSvt,svtdEdx,emcY2,eefs,GeantOut,big,-dstout,CMuDst,fzin\",\"${INPUTFILE0}\"\)\'  >>${localLogFile}
    # --- check output
    #  we should see 4 files with non-zero length
    ls 
    if (! -s ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.tags.root) then
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.tags.root was not created. Abort !!! "
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.tags.root was not created. Abort !!! "     >>${localLogFile}
      exit $status
    endif

    if (! -s ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.hist.root) then
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.hist.root was not created. Abort !!! "
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.hist.root was not created. Abort !!! "      >>${localLogFile}
      exit $status
    endif

    if (! -s ${JOBFILEBASENAME}.geant.root) then
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file \"${JOBFILEBASENAME}.geant.root\" was not created. Abort !!! "
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file \"${JOBFILEBASENAME}.geant.root\" was not created. Abort !!! "  >>${localLogFile}
      exit $status
    endif

    if (! -s ${JOBFILEBASENAME}..event.root) then
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file \"${JOBFILEBASENAME}.event.root\" was not created. Abort !!! "
      echo "root4star ERROR. The output file \"${JOBFILEBASENAME}.event.root\" was not created. Abort !!! "  >>${localLogFile}
      exit $status
    endif

#    -------------------------------
#    register the result file (for the sake of the debugging)
#    -------------------------------

    ls -l *.root >>${localLogFile}
         
#    -------------------------------
#    Copy output files to the permanent place
#    -------------------------------

   foreach joboutfile (*.root) 
     echo " Starting ${joboutfile} transfering to BNL" >>${localLogFile}
     echo " Starting ${joboutfile} transfering to BNL"
     globus-url-copy -p 20 file:$SCRATCH/${joboutfile}    ${finalPackageDirectory}/${joboutfile}
   end      
     time
     time >>${localLogFile}
 # ----
 #   close local Web page
 # ----
    echo "
" >>${localLogFile}
